descriptionHtml:
Sorry,I am not good at English.
This text is the thing created by machine translation.


[size=100][color=red][b]Thank you for all your images!![/b][/color][/size]

This MOD is a standalone follower, meaning you don't need any other mods to install they.

This mod adds Elvan Sistar Followers,Anna and Uni.
They can be found in the Winking Skeever Inn, in Solitude.
They are essential, and Their body type are UNP. Anna(UNPB)Uni(UNP)

[color=#ffd966][size=2]Uni is ChildVoice,Please choose English version or the Japanese edition.[/size][/color]

[color=#e06666][size=4]Once you have installed the "Elfkko Followers", please do the save and reload. 
If you do not do this work, you cannot talk to her.[/size][/color]

Gwelda (Little) Red Riding Hood Outfit UUNP - CBBE by Deserter X / Linkle Outfit for Skyrim by Gimora Gwelda(I made a Retexture)
[img]http://www.fastpic.jp/images.php?file=2479433049.png[/img]
[color=#6aa84f][size=5][b][Anna  &  Uni][/b][/size][/color]

They are Poison regist and All regist 50%,but Their Health is very low,please give help.

[youtube]ktnuDE6nfKo[/youtube]

[color=#00ffff][size=4]They use Elemental Magics.
[/size][/color]
[img]http://www.fastpic.jp/images.php?file=2599891827.png[/img]
Anna:Valkyrie Javelin.High damage and High Bullet speed and Stagger effect(25%),but long chargetime.
Uni:Binding.Low damage and Slow Bullet speed and Long chargetime,but Stagger effect(25%) and Ranged Slow effect(80%10s)
Whirlwind Cloak. For 10s, opponents in melee range take blow off 3% per second.

[color=#00ffff][size=3]Anna is good at the batlle,preferring Dual wielding.She is powerless,but Elementals dwell in her sword.[/size][/color][color=#00ffff][size=3]
[/size][/color][img]http://www.fastpic.jp/images.php?file=1386999645.png[/img]
Firestorm(left hand),Icestorm(left hand),Earthquake,Iceform(25%),SummonFenrir(10s).The damage of about genuine 30%.

[color=#00ffff][size=3]Uni is a Summoner.She uses the magic to summon Elemental Monsters in random.[/size][/color]
[img]http://www.fastpic.jp/images.php?file=3139522235.jpg[/img]
[Low]Shade,Will-o'-the-wisp,HellHound,Sprite, Each 5%
[img]http://www.fastpic.jp/images.php?file=4596306905.jpg[/img]
[Middle]Sylph 15%,Gnome 15%,Salamander 10%,Frau 10%,Dryad 15%
[img]http://www.fastpic.jp/images.php?file=1013699007.jpg[/img]
[High]Djiin,Behimoth,Ifrit, Each 5%


[color=#00ffff][UpdateVersion][/color]
2.0>2.2
Fixed uni's glove.
Changed japanese voice file.


[color=#00ffff][Required Mods][/color]
Follower overhaul mod
>Ultimate Follower Overhaul by fLokii
>Extensible Follower Framework by Expired
>Amazing Follower Tweaks by Dheuster
>etc.

[color=#00ffff][Recommended Mods][/color]
Face Light by tktk1
NPCs do not rescale shrink resize when doing idle stuff by Mahlzeit88
Female Facial Animation by nao4288
HDT Physics Extensions by HydrogensaysHDT
